casebody.data:
IN RE J. J. GUIDO-SEGER, Minor. SC: 155405
COA: 333529 Supreme Court of Michigan. August 22, 2018

Order

By order of June 9, 2017, the application for leave to appeal the February 7, 2017 judgment of the Court of Appeals was held in abeyance pending the decision in In re Hill, Minors (Docket No. 155152). On order of the Court, leave to appeal having been denied in In re Hill, Minors , 501 Mich. 1047 , 909 N.W.2d 260 (2018), the application is again considered and, it appearing to this Court that the case of In re Ferranti, Minor (Docket No. 157907-8) is pending on appeal before this Court and that the decision in that case may resolve an issue raised in the present application for leave to appeal, we ORDER that the application be held in ABEYANCE pending the decision in that case.
